sentences.en: A megaphone boomed out, "This is the police."
sentences.cn: 扩音器响了起来：“我们是警察。”

sentences.en: He hawks with a megaphone, saving a lot of effort.
sentences.cn: 他用喇叭筒叫卖, 省劲多了!

sentences.en: He often speaks in public with a megaphone.
sentences.cn: 他常用扩音器当着大众演说.

sentences.en: McGonagall always stands by to take the megaphone away if he gets out of hand.
sentences.cn: 麦格教授总是站在一边,以便在他失控的时候抢下扩音器.

sentences.en: Somewhere a voice is loud a megaphone.
sentences.cn: 远处什么地方的扩音器里传来响亮的声音.

sentences.en: The Mega-Sonic Scatter-Cat Repeller looks like a megaphone because it actually is one.
sentences.cn: 这个超音波驱猫器看上去像个扩音器，因为它的确是的。

sentences.en: There was just one announcement over the megaphone, about 30 minutes before the ship tilted to its side.
sentences.cn: 船上只用扩音器通知了一次，约30分钟后船就向一边倾斜。

sentences.en: With a price tag estimated in the billions of dollars, the new Xinhua is an expensive megaphone.
sentences.cn: 据估计，新的新华社的市值为数十亿美元，看起来就像是一只昂贵的扩音器。

trans.tran_en: a piece of equipment like a large horn which you talk through to make your voice sound louder, when you are speaking to a crowd
